journalEntries.JournalEntry: Today we went over Book 2 Chapter 2 JavaScript Objects. We practiced objects doing the lighting exercise in the chapter. I understand the difference between objects{} and arrays[]. Also learned about Dot and Bracket notation
Went over the queryselector and how it can be used to change items in the html without writing additional html code. Set up a class in CSS and you are able to manipulate the HTML with Javascript
Built and styled the 1st part of the daily journal
Went over the Flexbox, and how it can be used to style pages, was able to complete the coffehouse practice!
Learned about API's(application program interface). Really cool but a little confusing.
Completed the 3rd step of the daily journal fairly easy, wrote a function that inserts my html info into the DOM!
